description.value: DietCode : Codes that can be used to indicate the type of food being ordered for a patient. This value set includes all children of SNOMED CT Concepts (US Extension and Core) from SCTID 182922004 Dietary regime (Therapeutic or Preventive Procedure) and is provided as a suggestive example
